## Installing Packages

To install packages for this workshop (using the install.packages function) select the run button in the code chunk below.


```{r}

install.packages(c("rmarkdown", "tidyverse", "DBI", "RSQLite", "connections", "fuzzyjoin", "REDCapR", "REDCapTidieR", "skimr", "labelled", "openxlsx2"))

```
